20101223010152.000|20101223010154.000|CC1|ALL ACROSS THE INLAND EMPIRE.   
20101223010154.000|20101223010156.000|CC1|THIS WAS THE FIFTH STRAIGHT DAY 
20101223010156.000|20101223010158.000|CC1|OF RAINFALL IN THE INLAND INLAND
20101223010158.000|20101223010159.000|CC1|EMPIRE AND THE STORM CELL THAT  
20101223010159.000|20101223010201.000|CC1|CAME THROUGH THIS MORNING WAS

20101223010209.000|20101223010210.000|CC1|MIRA LOMA.

20101223010212.000|20101223010215.000|CC1|AS FOR THE SANTA ANA RIVER IT   
20101223010215.000|20101223010218.000|CC1|CAME VERY CLOSE TO CRESTING THE 
20101223010218.000|20101223010220.000|CC1|VAN BUREN BRIDGE THIS MORNING.

20101223010223.000|20101223010224.000|CC1|ACROSS THE CITY.

20101223010232.000|20101223010234.000|CC1|FLOODWATER AND AN EARLY MORNING 
20101223010234.000|20101223010235.000|CC1|MUDSLIDE FORCED THE EVACUATION

20101223010428.000|20101223010430.000|CC1|ACTUALLY PART OF THE BUSINESS   
20101223010430.000|20101223010430.000|CC1|DISTRICT.

20101223010649.000|20101223010651.000|CC1|ARE IN EFFECT FOR PARTS OF      
20101223010651.000|20101223010652.000|CC1|EASTERN ORANGE COUNTY.          
20101223010652.000|20101223010655.000|CC1|HERE IS WHY THE WORST OF IT IN  
20101223010655.000|20101223010656.000|CC1|SILVERADO CANYON WHERE THE ONLY 
20101223010656.000|20101223010658.000|CC1|ROAD OUT FOR RESIDENTS IS WASHED
20101223010658.000|20101223010658.000|CC1|OUT.                            
20101223010658.000|20101223010700.000|CC1|FLOOD WATERS ALSO DAMAGED THIS  
20101223010700.000|20101223010701.000|CC1|BRIDGE.                         
20101223010701.000|20101223010702.000|CC1|IN MODJESKA CANYON A SIMILAR    
20101223010702.000|20101223010705.000|CC1|SCENE CARS STUCK IN THE MUD,    
20101223010705.000|20101223010706.000|CC1|VEHICLES STUCK THERE.           
20101223010706.000|20101223010708.000|CC1|IN WILLIAMS CANYON AN RV TURNED 
20101223010708.000|20101223010710.000|CC1|INTO A BOAT.                    
20101223010710.000|20101223010712.000|CC1|EVACUATION CENTERS HAVE BEEN SET
20101223010712.000|20101223010714.000|CC1|UP AT CALVERY CHURCH FOR PEOPLE 
20101223010714.000|20101223010714.000|CC1|IN THE AREA.

20101223010715.000|20101223010717.000|CC1|RAIN SEEN IN MORE THAN 30 YEARS.

20101223010740.000|20101223010742.000|CC1|STATION FIRE OCCURRED.

20101223013044.000|20101223013046.000|CC1|THISES THE MOHAVE RIVER WHERE   
20101223013046.000|20101223013047.000|CC1|ALL THE WATER IS GOING.         
20101223013047.000|20101223013048.000|CC1|NORMALLY RESIDENTS SAY YOU DON'T
20101223013048.000|20101223013050.000|CC1|SEE ANY WATER IN HERE.
